channel.title: Error
channel.description:
So I got bored and downloaded a source to play around with. I use drowning 508.
I can code java pretty well but I suck at fixing errors.
I get this when a player dies, and something similiar when a monster dies. I guess it's a problem with the item drop system:
Player Dies:
[code]Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.NullPointerException at palidino76.rs2.player.Player.dropStuff(Player.java:3522) at palidino76.rs2.player.Player.process(Player.java:2145) at palidino76.rs2.Engine.run(Engine.java:230) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:662) [/code]

item.title: Error
item.dc:creator: @someone2 someone2
